name: VoxHash Portfolio
description: Modern portfolio website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features dark/light theme, animations, and responsive design.

name: AI Chat Application
description: Real-time chat application with AI integration using OpenAI API. Built with React, Node.js, and WebSocket for instant messaging.

name: Dev Tools CLI
description: Command-line toolkit for developers with utilities for project setup, code generation, and deployment automation.

name: Data Visualization Dashboard
description: Interactive dashboard for visualizing complex datasets with D3.js and React. Supports real-time data updates and custom chart types.

name: Microservices Authentication
description: JWT-based authentication service for microservices architecture. Includes user management, role-based access control, and API security.

name: Cross-Platform Mobile App
description: React Native application with offline support, push notifications, and native performance optimizations.
